'''Abyss Heralds''' are creatures that are a part of the [[Abyss Order]] and who are capable of manipulating intense abyssal energy. These creatures command the [[Abyss Mages]] and are even more twisted than them.

They can transform with an Abyssal Gospel.<ref>{{Ref/Domain|Abyssal Traces}}</ref>

==Drops==
{{Drops|abyss heralds}}

==Types==
*{{Enemy|Abyss Herald: Wicked Torrents}}

==Trivia==
*Alongside Abyss Lectors, Abyss Heralds are the rarest respawnable Elite Enemies outside of the [[Spiral Abyss]].
